They stood for a moment, man and boy, staring at each other. Then the handshake was broken; Dumbledore was at the door. "Good-bye, Tom. I shall see you at Hogwarts." "I think that will do," said the white-haired Dumbledore at Harry's side, and seconds later, they were soaring weightlessly through darkness once more, before landing squarely in the present-day office. "Sit down," said Dumbledore, landing beside Harry. Harry obeyed, his mind still full of what he had just seen.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
